snippet: A new storm brought more worry to a region where frustration continued to run high from Hurricane Sandy, barely a week gone.
abstract: Northeaster threatens to unravel progress made since Hurricane Sandy in ravaged New York area, delivering howling wind and high water inplaces where misery and frustration have yet to recede; storm disrupts efforts to bring life back to normal for already-suffering areas of New York and New Jersey.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by J. David Goodman, Andy Newman, Sarah Maslin Nir, Michael Schwirtz and Daniella Silva.

lead_paragraph: A new storm brought more worry to a region where frustration continued to run high from Hurricane Sandy, barely a week gone.

headline.seo: Northeaster Dumps Rain and Wet Snow on Hurricane-Battered New York Area
headline.main: Northeaster Adds to Misery, Dumping Rain and Snow
headline.print_headline: Northeaster Adds to the Misery, Dumping Rain and Wet Snow
